Name: Therais Book
About the game: THE GAME IS CURRENTLY NOT PLAYABLE ONLINE IT WILL STAY THIS WAY UNTIL I RELEASE THE NEW/REBOOT-VERSION, WHICH WILL TAKE SOME TIME. THERE WONT BE ANY SMALLER UPDATES UNTIL THEN EITHER. Therais Book is an open world one-man-project MMORPG with unique items and rare drops, monsters and animals, pets, instances, and everything you need to have a good time, alone or with your friends. Form groups and guilds and tackle big bosses together.
